casebody.data:
Jimmy Columbus BELL
v.
Bonnie BOYETTE, Superintendent, and the State of North Carolina. No. 644P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Jimmy Columbus Bell, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 28th day of December 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of February 2005."
